General.Name: SDS Group Bhd
General.Description: SDS Group Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the manufacture and distribution of bakery products in Malaysia, Singapore, and Indonesia. It operates in Retail and Wholesale segments. The company offers breads, pastries, cakes, western food, local food, casual dining, coffee and beverages, festive cookies, hampers, mooncakes, baby full month, and wedding gift sets, as well as various cuisines under the SDS, Top Baker, and Daily's brands. It distributes its bakery products through supermarkets, convenience stores, mini marts, petrol kiosks, factories, and schools, as well as licenses and operates food and beverage outlets. The company sells its products through retail outlets, including bakeries, cafés, and bakery-cum-cafés. SDS Group Berhad was founded in 1984 and is based in Johor Bahru, Malaysia.
